name: Forsaken (itch) (TierneyV3)
description:
Forsaken  is a third person shooter with some horror elements. As Sandro Hausner you must investigate mysterious underground bases and defeat any enemies that stand in your way! But be careful of what lurks in the shadows.

Special thanks to the users over at freesound.org for any sound effects and music you hear in this game. 

@SirBedlam,  Theo Teravainen, @lennyboy,  @seanmorrissey96, @GFL7,  @FilmmakersManual, @Robinhood76, Joshua Empyre, @qubodup, @sonidotv, @Jamius and @bigmanjoe
